name: uk-attitudes-to-offensive-language-and-gestures-data
title: UK attitudes to offensive language and gestures data
description:
Data from media research on attitudes to offensive language and gestures in the UK. The research was performed for the UK's media regulator, Ofcom, by Ipsos MORI.

This dataset contains data from the research. The full research contains guidance on methodology and how to use the data.
The research was published on 30 September 2016.

The main report can be found at:
https://www.ofcom.org.uk/__data/assets/pdf_file/0022/91624/OfcomOffensiveLanguage.pdf 
with a quick reference guide at
https://www.ofcom.org.uk/__data/assets/pdf_file/0023/91625/OfcomQRG-AOC.pdf

resources.name: Caution
resources.description: This file contains text on the need for caution in using the data.

resources.name: List of swearwords and offensive gestures
resources.description: This file contains the list of swearwords and offensive gestures from the research. All fields should be self-explanatory. More detail in the research performed for the UK's media regulator, Ofcom, by Ipsos MORI.
